messages.title: CLEAN UP POLITICS
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems will CLEAN UP POLITICS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to clean up Westminster, counter corrupt MPs, and stop MPs being bought by bankers and billionaire donors.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many areas, Labour simply can't win; it's a two horse race between the Lib Dems or the Conservatives. Voting Labour just helps the Conservatives win. It’s a choice between the Liberal Democrats or the Conservatives.

issues.governance: The Conservatives have spent £6 million over two years...largely funded, by... Lord Ashcroft

images.caption: Lib Dem leaders past and present with a caption: 'We need a change. When the Lib Dems put forward plans to clean up Westminster, Labour and the Conservative MPs voted them down.'

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet seems to be focused on the issue of political corruption and the influence of billionaires and bankers on politics, specifically targeting the Conservative Party and positioning the Liberal Democrats as the solution.
